column2: Land for sale in Yatadola Matugama
column6: LAND FOR SALE  – MATUGAMA•This land is located in "Yatadola – Matugama is an ideal opportunity for an investor to buy one of the most sought after location in Yatadola – Matugama area.• Property is situated Just 30 meters (3rd block) away from Yatadola-Aluthgama bus road and distance to the Yatadola junction is 4kms. Total distance to the Matugama town is 6kms and this highly elevated tea land is located right in the heart of Manikgoda village.• Beautifully and environmental friendly developed land consists of tarred and concrete Roads and Drains, three phase electricity and local authority approvals for all the blocks. Investor who prefers to continue the tea land as a business might have the possibility of servicing his loan installments out the tea income on a regular basis.• Just 15 minutes drive to Dodangoda highway entrance and property is reasonably priced from Rs.69,000/- per perch to Rs.99,000/-.• Life time opportunity to grab a block of land in Kalutara District for a price less than Rs.900,000/-.• Hurry up only few blocks are available for sale right now.

column2: Rubber Estate for Sale in Baduraliya
column6: 65 acres of Rubber, Tea and Coconut estate for sale in Baduraliya (Kaluthara District) area. Nearest town is Baduraliya which is 04 Km from the estate. Total distance from Southern Highway (Dodanduwa exit) approximately 25 Km, about 35 minutes’ drive. Sinharaja Forest is 45 minutes’ drive from the estate. Popular Athwelthota bathing place is just 7Km away from the estate.
